page.title: 20OUR CONCLUSIONS ON CUFFLEY.
page.content: After working for four months on this Domesday Project we have found out lots of new and interesting facts about our village and the surrounding area. We have enjoyed doing the work and hope that it will benefit many people in the years ahead.Our conclusion is that we all think it is a good place to live and we are glad that we live here! Classes One and Two have all contributed to the work in here but particular thanks must go to : Claire Bartram, Claire Eaglen, James Eldridge, Christopher George, Sarah Gilbert, Sarah Honeyball, Tina Hodges, Deborah Kennerley, Clare Ripley, Andrew Rogers, Gareth Thomas, Alexandra Walsh,Victoria Wilson,Mrs.B. Brown and Mrs.Sarah Haley, who produced the final pieces of work and the photographs.
